main event: An unidentified object was detected on ground radar in Laconia, New Hampshire in September 1957.
interesting points: The object was on radar for 30 minutes before it disappeared two minutes after first being detected., The object moved both up and down and side to side., It was reported to be approximately 1-2 miles in diameter., Ground controllers were able to see the object on their radar scopes., The object was described as solid and moving very rapidly.
